MessagingDeliveryError.name: MessagingDeliveryError
MessagingDeliveryError.description: Represents a log of triggered outbound failures to verify when a triggered outbound has failed.

CreatedById.description: ID of the user who created the error.

DestinationPhoneNumber.description: The recipient of the phone call.

FailureReason.description: The provided reason for why the message failed.

FlowEntity.description: The entity that triggered the flow to send the message.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the error has been deleted.

LastModifiedById.description: The ID of the user who last modified the error log.

LastModifiedDate.description: Date when the Messaging error log was last modified.

MessagingTemplateId.description: ID of the Messaging template used.

Name.description: Name of the error. Maximum length is 80 characters.

SystemModstamp.description: System modification time for the Messaging delivery error log.

Type.description: The kind of event that occurred. Possible values include: Error (Default) Warning
